item.title: 程序員誓言(The Programmer Oath)鮑勃·馬丁大叔（Bob Martin）
item.description: I will not produce harmful code. The code that I produce will always be my best work. I will not knowingly allow code that is defective either in behavior or structure to accumulate. I will produce, with each release, a quick, sure, and repeatable proof that every element of the code works as it should. I will make frequent, small, releases so that I do not impede the progress of others.
